related_post.text: my use case is simple: i need to create a [POST] /api/files endpoint that stores the file info and sha256 to the db and then upload it to aws s3 (the file can be a few hundred MBs) i got it to work by creating a buffer of the multipart.File but how can i avoid having too much memory consumption?

comments: dezyre has question and radostin provides SO post answer
